info.name: Throw Away Mail Dark Theme
info.description: This will turn the https://www.throwawaymail.com/ default white theme to dark, much easier on the eyes. Not sure why there isn't an option to change the theme, this is normally standard.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0.0
  [+] Theme uploaded.
  [*] Privacy page is not done. And probably won't be done because who reads that. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
